item.title: Meet The Spy
item.dc:creator: Suggestive
item.description:
Dias:

They already did medic. The only classes they haven’t done are Engie, Demo and Soldier. Depending if the class-counter-class update method works the way they hoped, I’d imagine we’ll be seeing Engie and Demo next.

I’m talking about the next ‘Meet The…’ video - not class updates

Read full topic

item.title: Meet The Spy
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
Dias:

They already did medic. The only classes they haven’t done are Engie, Demo and Soldier. Depending if the class-counter-class update method works the way they hoped, I’d imagine we’ll be seeing Engie and Demo next.

Umm, what?
They did meet the demo and soldier, haven’t done medic, nor pyro. Your post is horribly misinformed.

So far they have done: demo, soldier, heavy, spy, scout, sniper.
Still have to do: pyro, medic and engie.

Read full topic

item.title: Meet The Spy
item.dc:creator: Suggestive
item.description:
Medic will most likely be next in my opinion (and hope :3).

I can’t help but feel that MTSpy was more…‘dramatic’ purely because of the Spy’s nature. I can’t imagine the MTMedic being along those movie-ish lines. Maybe another Interview sort of thing.

Can’t really pen down exactly what I’m thinking, but blargh.

Read full topic

item.title: Meet The Spy
item.dc:creator: GordonFreeman
item.description:
I’d definitely say from their latest work here, they’ve certainly improved. This was one of my favourite updates so far, can’t wait to see what would be next. Medic?

"What, are you president of his fan club?

No…that would be your mother!"

Amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: Meet The Spy
item.dc:creator: Ibanez
item.description:
Remember, that was their first short. They’ve only improved since then, so yeah.

Read full topic

item.title: Meet The Spy
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
I just feel that it needs more more action and/or interaction with other characters. I’m not very into watching people sit down a and talk about stuff, but you’re right - the “I have yet to meet one that can outsmart boolet” line makes me smile every time.

Read full topic

item.title: Meet The Spy
item.dc:creator: Lamsey
item.description:
I really like Meet The Heavy, because it’s an excellent parody of a very particular kind of TV interview. The camera effects in particular are spot on.

Read full topic

item.title: Meet The Spy
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
raw_bean:

Meet the Heavy was a great start, but seeing them progress all the way to the L4D intro movie and Meet the Spy they’re becoming incredibly adept at it.

I’ve always felt that Meet the Heavy was kinda dull, and now, thanks to Meet the Spy, I just can’t get myself to enjoy watching it. I hope they remake it one day.

Also, how about a little one-episode-a-week, five-minutes-long TF2 online series? Now THAT would be nice.

Read full topic

item.title: Meet The Spy
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
I’m always keen to see more animated narrative from Valve. Meet the Heavy was a great start, but seeing them progress all the way to the L4D intro movie and Meet the Spy they’re becoming incredibly adept at it.

Though I think proper animated short films like the ones Pixar do to show in front of their movies is a more realistic goal than a TV series.

Read full topic

item.description:
VaLve should look into making this into an actuall TV series!!

item.title: Meet The Spy
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Level:

At this point it’s assumed the Pyro is a girl, but it’s just a easter egg from valve.

The only reason people seem to think that is because of the pink purse. Valve is well aware that some people think this, so they poke fun at it, like the whole keyboard in portal thing after people asked about the ASHPD looking like A. Shepard.

The pyro has a pink purse because he’s flaming.

Read full topic

item.title: Meet The Spy
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
raw_bean:

Gullible much? Keep reading the blog, and it’s ‘confirmed’ that Robin Walker fired everyone that work’s at Valve. They’re just having fun teasing us since they found it so funny that people started theorising the obviously male Pyro is a girl. And yes I’ve seen the handbag. It was funny. It doesn’t really mean anything.

Confirmed is the wrong word. At this point it’s assumed the Pyro is a girl, but it’s just a easter egg from valve.

Read full topic
